channel.title: [pi] perfect!
channel.description:
hey guys, this might seem like an easy thing to add but iv been trying for so long and can't find it. i wish to add bonus's to my perfect ring. iv search the "source folder" for 773 & perfect ring and i can't find where to edit them on pi. i have searched item.cfg
please help guys. and does anyone know a ::modhp command & ::hit command thankyou

item.title: [pi] perfect!
item.dc:creator: @moerin moerin
item.description:
@moerin wrote:

[quote=“s w 3 3 t1, post:6, topic:372505”]like a command which gives you 999k hp? and would you know how to make it so you cant teleport from jail on a pi?
and do you know how to make it so owners can teleport in wildy? thankyou[/quote]
Just edit in your Characters.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] perfect!
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

Source/data/cfg/item.cfg
Search for 773 and you should see something similar to this item = 773 'perfect'_ring A_perfect_ruby_ring. 1000000 1000000 1000000 1000000 1000000 1000000 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0
Change those numbers to the bonus’s you wan it to have.
Save, compile, restart server.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] perfect!
item.dc:creator: @Vince2 Vince,
item.description:
@Vince2 wrote:

Never used PI… Try searching for perfect_ring, need the underscore. You’d probably have more luck in the config/bin folder.

Read full topic
